remarks: A function on an open interval, with bounded derivative, is bounded. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
dvbdfbdioolem2.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) $.
dvbdfbdioolem2.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR ) $.
dvbdfbdioolem2.altb $e |- ( ph -> A < B ) $.
dvbdfbdioolem2.f $e |- ( ph -> F : ( A (,) B ) --> RR ) $.
dvbdfbdioolem2.dmdv $e |- ( ph -> dom ( RR _D F ) = ( A (,) B ) ) $.
dvbdfbdioolem2.k $e |- ( ph -> K e. RR ) $.
dvbdfbdioolem2.dvbd $e |- ( ph -> A. x e. ( A (,) B ) ( abs ` ( ( RR _D F ) ` x ) ) <_ K ) $.
dvbdfbdioolem2.m $e |- M = ( ( abs ` ( F ` ( ( A + B ) / 2 ) ) ) + ( K x. ( B - A ) ) ) $.
dvbdfbdioolem2 $p |- ( ph -> A. x e. ( A (,) B ) ( abs ` ( F ` x ) ) <_ M ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
$d F x $.
$d K x $.
$d ph x $.
